CHAT.comment: the child first teaches his mother to make a minature figure jump up and down 3 times and sit on a minature park bench.

u.a: performs task , simultaneous with C below .
says the letter w , simultaneous with M above

CHAT.comment: child teaches mother to make a figure jump over a big figure , run around a little figure and sit on the bench.
child teaches mother to string beads; first a round one and then a square bead.

u.a: several unclear utterances C mumbles into his chest as he tries to string the bead . Appears to be talking to the bead trying to convince it to go on the string .
